Key Match Events: Roland Sallai scored the opening goal for Hungary in the 32nd minute.
Virgil van Dijk received a red card in the 79th minute for a second booking.
Denzel Dumfries scored the equalizer for the Netherlands in the 83rd minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Virgil van Dijk will miss the next match against Germany due to his red card.
Hungary will look to build on their performance against Bosnia-Herzegovina.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zsolt Nagy was named Man of the Match for his performance and assist.
Hungary had only 26% possession but managed to score with their only shot on target.
Netherlands had 74% possession and 16 shots but struggled to convert their chances.
